name: Check if user_dietician is able to update a patient with invalid patient details and mandatory request body
description: Given: User creates PUT Request for dietician API endpoint for updating the patient records

steps.name: When  User sends HTTPS Request and request Body with mandatory and additional  fields to update a patient records with invalid patientID from the excel sheet "Update_Patient" and 0
Then  User recieves 400 bad request is created and update failed
